name: Farmers Apocalypse
description:
Help your turret fight off zombies by farming ammo. Left click plots of farm to plant a crop. Select your crop from the menu at the bottom. Right click to open the store and upgrade yourself and the turret. Defeat each boss to unlock new ammo and win the game.

This game was made for the Wowie! Jam 4.0 in 3 days with the theme "Collaborate with AI".

All sounds are from freesounds.org
